attributes.comment:
Dear Sirs,
We are a couple waiting to adopt from China. We are sending this request to please beg you not
to raise the fees on fingerprinting and the I-600A.
We started this process in June of 2005 and are still waiting for a child.
I know you can not put a price on a child but this whole process has been very over whelming
and very emotional.
After 3 surgeries and years of Fertility Doctors, of which insurance does not pay for and all the
money spent towards adopting a child, raising these fees will be just another brick in the wall
between us and a family.
Our agency is telling us it could still be another year and yes we will have to pay these fees
AGAIN!
There are no words to decribe the feeling each day, waiting and waiting for a child. Please,
please open your hearts please do not raise these fees.
Thank you
Jane and Larry Cremeans
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jane and Larry Cremeans
